snippet.title: Mirth Island (Game Jam+ Indonesia 2022)
snippet.description:
"Mirth Island"
A young boy sets sail on the sea and arrives on an island called Mirth Island, hoping to erase the sadness inside his heart. As he arrives on the island, a kind cave tells the boy to help the people on the island to be happy. Will the boy be able to find happiness in the end?

Game created by Clay Game Studio
Play the Mirth Island Game on itch.io:
https://ilhamhe.itch.io/mirth-island

Join our discord channel:
https://discord.com/invite/Pqq9hRs

Instagram:
https://www.instagram.com/claygamestudio/

Twitter:
https://twitter.com/claygamestudio
